cardTypes.name: Gravelock Elder
cardTypes.description: Other Gravelock creatures you control gain +1 Attack and +1 Health while Gravelock Elder is in play.
cardTypes.flavor: Gravelocks look up to their elders... literally.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Gravelock Raider
cardTypes.flavor: You can handle one or two, but before you know it, they're everywhere.

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

cardTypes.name: Infected Gravelock
cardTypes.description: When Infected Gravelock deals damage to a creature, that creature gets poisoned for 3 rounds. Infected Gravelock has Move 0.
cardTypes.flavor: "It's seeping out of their god-damn pores."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

cardTypes.name: Gravehawk
cardTypes.description: For each of your Gravelocks, Gravehawk gains +1 Attack.
cardTypes.flavor: "Mom always said I'd end up in bad company. If she only knew..." \n- Ryssa, Gravehawk

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

cardTypes.name: Elan Vital
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit is healed by 1 Health each round.
cardTypes.flavor: Heal faster than you hurt and you'll keep fighting forever.

passiveRules.description: All non-combat damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Crown of Strength
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit gains +1 Attack and +2 Health.
cardTypes.flavor: The power of kings, imbued through discarded headwear.

cardTypes.name: Bear Paw
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit gains +2 Attack and +2 Health. When Bear Paw enters play, enchanted unit's Countdown increases by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The gods saw fit to give it strong limbs and a mellow temperament.

cardTypes.name: Binding Root
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit's Move is decreased by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: There's no better ally than the ground beneath your enemies.

cardTypes.name: Hymn
cardTypes.description: Heal target unit by 3 Health.
cardTypes.flavor: Music for those who can't dance.

cardTypes.name: Metempsychosis
cardTypes.description: Target unit you control is resummoned on the same tile.
cardTypes.flavor: Consider the egg. The image of unfulfilled potential, and you eat them for breakfast...

cardTypes.name: Thought Trap
cardTypes.description: Target unit's Countdown is doubled.
cardTypes.flavor: How far will a blind dog walk into a forest?

cardTypes.name: Rallying
cardTypes.description: All units you control have their Countdown decreased by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: FOLLOW THE JARL FOR THE KIN!

cardTypes.name: Brother of the Wolf
cardTypes.description: When Brother of the Wolf's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to summon a Ragged\nWolf on an adjacent tile.
cardTypes.flavor: Befriending wolves isn't that hard. Failure, however, can be costly.

cardTypes.name: Callback
cardTypes.description: Target unit you control is returned to your hand.
cardTypes.flavor: Everyone deserves a second chance.

cardTypes.name: Catapult of Goo
cardTypes.description: Units attacked by Catapult of Goo have their Countdown increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "I don't know if the piddlejacks are drivers or parasites on that infernal machine." \n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiveRules.description: This unit attacks at a specific section of the board.

cardTypes.name: Thunder Surge
cardTypes.description: Target unit, and all units connected by adjacent units, receive 2 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: Fear not the thunder. Fear the lightning.

cardTypes.name: Champion Ring
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit gets +2 Attack.
cardTypes.flavor: Hard to earn, even harder to carry.

cardTypes.name: Burn
cardTypes.description: Deal 3 damage to target unit. If that unit is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: "If you can't handle the fire, cool yourself in the kettle." \n- Old machine priest saying.

cardTypes.name: Fertile Soil
cardTypes.description: Sacrifice target creature you control and draw 3 scrolls.
cardTypes.flavor: The Kinfolk don't mourn their dead; nature doesn't waste life.

cardTypes.name: Death Cap Berserk
cardTypes.description: When Death Cap Berserk comes into play, and at the beginning of its following turns, enchanted creature's Countdown is decreased by 2. At the end of these turns, it is dealt 2 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: "I love music. Especially wardrums." \n- Harald, Berserker

cardTypes.name: Destroyer
cardTypes.flavor: About to dodge? It's too late!

passiveRules.description: This unit attacks at a specific section of the board.

cardTypes.name: Druid Burial Ground
cardTypes.description: At the beginning of your turn, Druid Burial Ground adjacent units are healed by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "I once saw two cats fighting next to such a monument. The fight lasted a week, then they starved to death."\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

cardTypes.name: Quake
cardTypes.description: Deal 3 damage to all structures and 2 damage to all creatures.
cardTypes.flavor: No matter your skill, you can't parry the ground.

passiveRules.description: When Quake is played, subsequent castings of Quake have their cost increased by 2.

cardTypes.name: Inferno Blast
cardTypes.description: Deal 1 damage to target tile and all adjacent tiles.
cardTypes.flavor: The power of ten men in one practical projectile.

cardTypes.name: Flip
cardTypes.description: Move target opponent unit to any unoccupied tile on opponent's board.
cardTypes.flavor: A shift in perspective isn't always a good thing.

cardTypes.name: Frost Wind
cardTypes.description: Add +1 Countdown to units on target tile and adjacent tiles.
cardTypes.flavor: Packing an extra blanket is always good. Or five, if you're heading north.

cardTypes.name: Great Wolf
cardTypes.description: Great Wolf gets +1 Attack for every other Wolf you control.
cardTypes.flavor: The beasts have legends too.

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

cardTypes.name: Iron Ogre
cardTypes.flavor: Step aside or be disintegrated.

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.
All combat damage dealt to Iron Ogre is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Junkyard
cardTypes.description: Rat creatures you control gain +1 Health while Junkyard is in play.
cardTypes.flavor: Rats aren't picky.

cardTypes.name: Kinfolk Brave
cardTypes.flavor: Braves are eager to prove their worth. The Jarls are happy to let them.

cardTypes.name: Kinfolk Jarl
cardTypes.description: For each creature adjacent to Kinfolk Jarl, Kinfolk Jarl gains +1 Attack.
cardTypes.flavor: The strength of his people, crushing your people.

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.
When Kinfolk Jarl comes into play, adjacent units have their Attack increased by 1 until end of turn.

cardTypes.name: Leeching Ring
cardTypes.description: When enchanted creature deals damage, enchanted creature is healed equal to its base Countdown.
cardTypes.flavor: Search the ponds. Find one and your name is eternal.

passiveRules.description: All non-combat damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Mangy Wolf
cardTypes.description: When Mangy Wolf deals damage, it is healed by 1. Other Wolf creatures you control have their Countdown decreased by 1 when Mangy Wolf comes into play.
cardTypes.flavor: "The fat wolf is not dangerous."\n- Kinfolk proverb

cardTypes.name: Dryadic Power
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature gains +1 Attack and +3 Health, and its Move is decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The strength of a tree with the resolve of a rock.

cardTypes.name: Potion of Resistance
cardTypes.description: All damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced to 1 for 3 rounds.
cardTypes.flavor: Sometimes you've just got to take the hit.

cardTypes.name: Pushback
cardTypes.description: Target opponent unit is returned to its owner's hand.
cardTypes.flavor: You know you're not wanted when your body dissolves.

cardTypes.name: Ragged Wolf
cardTypes.flavor: Fast and feisty.

passiveRules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

cardTypes.name: Kabonk
cardTypes.description: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Ouch!

cardTypes.name: Shrine
cardTypes.description: As long as Shrine is in play, all other units you control gain +1 Health.
cardTypes.flavor: With a strong enough faith, you don't need gods for miracles.

cardTypes.name: Sinmarked Zealot
cardTypes.description: When Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice Sinmarked Zealot to deal 2 damage to target unit.
cardTypes.flavor: When his time comes, so will yours.

abilities.name: Sacrifice Attack
abilities.description: Deals 2 damage to selected enemy and kills itself.

cardTypes.name: Sister of the Fox
cardTypes.description: When Sister of the Fox comes into play, draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: The eyes and ears of the Jarl.

cardTypes.name: Royal Vanguard
cardTypes.description: When Royal Vanguard's Countdown becomes 0, adjacent units gain +2 Attack until end of turn.
cardTypes.flavor: Honor. Power. Axe.

cardTypes.name: Speed
cardTypes.description: Target unit's Countdown is decreased by 3.
cardTypes.flavor: They won't know what hit them.

cardTypes.name: Essence Feast
cardTypes.description: For each unit you control, heal your idol on the same row by 1. Beast creatures deal double damage to idols this turn.
cardTypes.flavor: Just like love, it can heal and hurt.

cardTypes.name: Pother
cardTypes.description: Target unit is moved to a random adjacent tile. Draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Now you're there, now you're not!

cardTypes.name: Unleash Inner Power
cardTypes.description: Target creature's Attack is increased by its Health value. Its Health is then set to 2.
cardTypes.flavor: My very essence shall be my blade.

cardTypes.name: Lifestealer
cardTypes.description: When Lifestealer attacks and destroys a unit, Lifestealer is fully healed.
cardTypes.flavor: One day he'll pay for these borrowed lives.

cardTypes.name: Eternal Statue
cardTypes.description: At the beginning of your turn, Eternal Statue heals 1 point of Health.
cardTypes.flavor: It's said some sculptors infuse their work with a life of its own.

cardTypes.name: Waking Stones
cardTypes.description: All damage dealt to Waking Stones is reduced to 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "The problem with stone is that it is stationary. We fixed that."\n- Uria, Geo Mage

cardTypes.name: Transposition
cardTypes.description: Switch places of two units you control. Draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: You don't need powerful allies. You need allies in the right places.

cardTypes.name: Vitality Well
cardTypes.description: When Vitality Well's Countdown becomes 0, all friendly units are healed by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Refreshing!

passiveRules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

cardTypes.name: Blessing of Haste
cardTypes.description: Target unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: A little bit of speed can make all the difference.

cardTypes.name: Ancestral Totem
cardTypes.description: As long as Ancestral Totem is in play, creatures you control gain +1 Attack.
cardTypes.flavor: Kinfolk creations aren't always pleasant.

cardTypes.name: Copper Automaton
cardTypes.description: Copper Automaton is destroyed after attacking.
cardTypes.flavor: Explosively cute.

cardTypes.name: Spark
cardTypes.description: Deal 2 damage to target unit.
cardTypes.flavor: The smallest spark can cause a decent flame.

cardTypes.name: Cannon Automaton
cardTypes.flavor: wrrr wrrr clunk phssssht BwoooOOOM wrrr wrrr

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.
All combat damage dealt to Cannon Automaton is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Bitter Root
cardTypes.description: When Bitter Root is attacked in melee, attacking unit becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.
cardTypes.flavor: "Sure, there's plenty to eat in the swamps. Shame it's all poisoned." \n- Gundar, Marsh Guide

cardTypes.name: Violent Dispersal
cardTypes.description: Deal 8 damage to target unit.
cardTypes.flavor: "When he said 'Disperse!' I thought he meant all of us. Turns out he was only addressing poor Mikal." \n- Mahts, Infantryman

cardTypes.name: Focus
cardTypes.description: Target creature gains +3 Attack until end of turn.
cardTypes.flavor: If it's worth killing, kill it good!

cardTypes.name: New Orders
cardTypes.description: All your units have their Move increased by 1 until end of turn.
cardTypes.flavor: REGROUP!

cardTypes.name: Honorable General
cardTypes.description: When Honorable General's Countdown becomes 0, all adjacent units have their Countdown decreased by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: Time and again, he has brought victory. The Empire's reward is war.

cardTypes.name: Kinfolk Veteran
cardTypes.flavor: It's tough getting old in this business.

passiveRules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

cardTypes.name: Rumble
cardTypes.description: Opponent's units move one step to a random adjacent empty tile.
cardTypes.flavor: Shaken, not crushed.

cardTypes.name: Fury
cardTypes.description: All units have their Countdown decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Fanning the flames of battle.

cardTypes.name: Crimson Bull
cardTypes.description: All units you control gain +2 Attack until end of turn.
cardTypes.flavor: Drink, and take flight!

cardTypes.name: Machine Priest
cardTypes.description: Instead of attacking, Machine Priest heals all your structures by 1. When Machine Priest's Countdown is 0, you can reset its Countdown to move a structure one step in a random direction.

abilities.name: Displace Structure
abilities.description: Target structure is moved to a random unoccupied, adjacent tile.

cardTypes.name: Ember Bonds
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit receives 2 damage before attacking.
cardTypes.flavor: It's inevitable.

cardTypes.name: End of Reason
cardTypes.description: Sacrifice all units you control with a non-zero Countdown. Each unit sacrificed this way deals 2 damage to opponent units on the same row.
cardTypes.flavor: "You served me well as soldiers. Now serve me as projectiles!"\n- Arran, Machine Priest

cardTypes.name: Ether Pump
cardTypes.description: When Ether Pump attacks, opponent's units are dealt 1 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: "I know what it looks like! Trust me. A few of these will win any siege." \n- Arran, Machine Priest

cardTypes.name: Golem Skin
cardTypes.description: When Golem Skin comes into play, sacrifice all your structures. Enchanted creature gains Attack and Health equal to the number of structures sacrificed.
cardTypes.flavor: When you wear machines, laundry day is your greatest worry.

cardTypes.name: Frost Gale
cardTypes.description: Deal 1 damage to all units.
cardTypes.flavor: Bad weather is a great weapon. If only you could aim it.

cardTypes.name: Magma Pack
cardTypes.description: When Magma Pack comes into play, enchanted unit's Attack is doubled. Enchanted unit is destroyed after attacking.
cardTypes.flavor: Don't worry, just push the button when you arrive.

cardTypes.name: Plate Armor
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit has Armor 1 (combat damage dealt to enchanted unit is decreased by 1) and its Health is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "If only we had enough for everyone..."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

cardTypes.name: Tick Bomb
cardTypes.description: Destroy target structure.
cardTypes.flavor: Sounds like tick, looks like tick.

cardTypes.name: Vitriol Aura
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit is attacked in melee combat, attacker becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.
cardTypes.flavor: Try not to breathe.

cardTypes.name: Eye of Eagle
cardTypes.description: Take the next creature scroll from your library and add it to your hand.
cardTypes.flavor: Strategy is nothing if you're blind.

cardTypes.name: Proximity Charge
cardTypes.description: When Proximity Charge is destroyed in melee combat, attacking unit is dealt 4 damage. When Proximity Charge comes into play, one copy is summoned on a random adjacent tile.
cardTypes.flavor: Tread lightly!

cardTypes.name: Frostbeard
cardTypes.description: When Frostbeard is killed in battle, friendly units gain +2 Attack until end of your turn.
cardTypes.flavor: An honorable death is not to be mourned; it's a blessing.

cardTypes.name: Heritage
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, you draw 2 scrolls.
cardTypes.flavor: "This way your life, or death, won't be a complete waste." \n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

cardTypes.name: Faith Blessing
cardTypes.description: Target unit you control takes 2 damage. Your idol on that row is healed by 4.
cardTypes.flavor: "It's an immense honor. Be grateful for it." \n- Pater Brecht

cardTypes.name: Nutrition
cardTypes.description: Sacrifice target unit you control and add that unit's cost to your current resources.
cardTypes.flavor: A cadaver for some, a feast for others.

cardTypes.name: Powerbound
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, increase your Order by one.
cardTypes.flavor: "I'll just borrow some life force when you don't need it anymore."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

cardTypes.name: Gun Automaton
cardTypes.flavor: A special kind of turtle.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Vengeance Veil
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit takes damage, its Countdown decreases by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: All is blood from behind the crimson veil.

passiveRules.description: When Vengeance Veil is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Vengeance Veil.

cardTypes.name: Useless Contraption
cardTypes.flavor: Working as intended.

cardTypes.name: Purification
cardTypes.description: Remove all Enchantments from target unit.
cardTypes.flavor: The innocence of youth can cleanse the corrupt.

cardTypes.name: Ranger's Bane
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.
cardTypes.flavor: You haven't really died until you've been slowly strangled by poisonous roots.

cardTypes.name: Horn of Ages
cardTypes.description: All units opponent controls have their Move decreased by 1 until end of opponent's turn.
cardTypes.flavor: You're thankful for surviving battles past, until you crumble under the weight of the memories.

cardTypes.name: Mire Curse
cardTypes.description: Mire Curse deals 1 poison damage to adjacent creatures at the beginning of each of its turns.
cardTypes.flavor: It's putrid, but it's home.

cardTypes.name: Faith Chains
cardTypes.description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, Faith Chains deals 1 damage to each of opponent's idols.
cardTypes.flavor: "The chains weigh heavier on them, my son." \n- Pater Brecht

cardTypes.name: Bloodboil
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit takes damage, increase the unit's Attack by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: AURRGH... YOU... I... KILL RAAAHH!!

passiveRules.description: When Bloodboil is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Bloodboil.

cardTypes.name: Summons
cardTypes.description: Draws one Structure from your library.
cardTypes.flavor: "We need more stuff!" \n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

cardTypes.name: Scattergunner
cardTypes.flavor: "He was carrying WHAT?!"\n- Mahts, Infantryman

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Law Memorial
cardTypes.description: When Law Memorial's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed and Order is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: You'd think a people so fond of writing would remember the words of their ancestors.

cardTypes.name: Desert Memorial
cardTypes.description: When Desert Memorial is destroyed, increase Energy by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Breakers against the eroding waves of time.

cardTypes.name: Tribal Memorial
cardTypes.description: Pay 2 Energy to destroy Tribal Memorial and increase Growth by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Lest we forget the times of peace.

abilities.name: Pay 2 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 2 Energy to destroy ${NAME} and increase Growth by 1.

cardTypes.name: Woodland Memorial
cardTypes.description: When you play a Spell or Enchantment, Woodland Memorial is destroyed. Increase Growth by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The Kinfolk have forgotten, but the trees remember.

cardTypes.name: Sand Pact Memorial
cardTypes.description: When Sand Pact Memorial comes into play, increase your current Energy by 5.
cardTypes.flavor: Like grains of sand in an hourglass, our memories fade over time.

cardTypes.name: Stone Pact Memorial
cardTypes.description: When Stone Pact Memorial comes into play, increase Order by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: We remember the times, but not the promises.

cardTypes.name: Illthorn Seed
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, summon Illthorn in its place.
cardTypes.flavor: This corpse brings its own flowers to the funeral.

cardTypes.name: Illthorn
cardTypes.flavor: "Look, Barbra. Wires!" \n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiveRules.description: When Illthorn is attacked in melee, Illthorn deals 1 damage to attacking unit.

cardTypes.name: Decimation
cardTypes.description: All units on target row lose 1 Health. Opponent's idol on that row loses 2 Health.
cardTypes.flavor: One by one by one they fall, and now we've reached the Cobalt Hall...

cardTypes.name: God Hand
cardTypes.description: All your units gain +2 Attack until end of turn, and have their Countdown decreased by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: Howl for the gods!

cardTypes.name: Hellspitter Mortar
cardTypes.description: Attacks a randomly selected tile on opponent's board.
cardTypes.flavor: Aim? With enough power you don't need aim.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Knight Scholar
cardTypes.description: When Knight Scholar's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Knowledge is strength.

cardTypes.name: Obelisk
cardTypes.flavor: Good for leaning on. And hiding behind...

cardTypes.name: Ducal Infantryman
cardTypes.description: All other creatures you control on the same row as Ducal Infantryman gain +1 Attack.
cardTypes.flavor: Strength in numbers.

cardTypes.name: Ducal Skirmisher
cardTypes.flavor: Slice and dice!

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

cardTypes.name: Ducal Spearman
cardTypes.flavor: If you bait them, they will come.

passiveRules.description: When Ducal Spearman is attacked in melee, Ducal Spearman deals 2 damage to attacking unit.

cardTypes.name: Resonant Helm
cardTypes.flavor: You'll hear the silent whispers of magic and it will change you.

passiveRules.displayName: Resonance: Enchanted unit is healed by 2
passiveRules.description: Enchanted unit's Health is healed by 2 every time you play a Spell.
All non-combat damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Crossbowman
cardTypes.flavor: Locked, loaded, and lying in wait...

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Royal Infantryman
cardTypes.description: All other creatures you control on the same row as Royal Infantryman gain +1 Health.
cardTypes.flavor: Yes, my Liege. I'll protect them, my Liege.

cardTypes.name: Royal Skirmisher
cardTypes.flavor: Double the swords, double the fun!

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

cardTypes.name: Royal Spearman
cardTypes.flavor: HOOOOOLLLD!

passiveRules.description: When Royal Spearman is attacked in melee, Royal Spearman deals 2 damage to attacking unit.

cardTypes.name: Bunny
cardTypes.description: If Bunny's Attack is 0, it will summon another Bunny in an adjacent tile instead of attacking.
cardTypes.flavor: Cute, crafty, and quick to procreate.

cardTypes.name: Gravelock Outcast
cardTypes.description: Pay one Growth to heal Gravelock Outcast to full health.
cardTypes.flavor: "Cast out from gravelock society? Wow, that's some feat."\n- Siani, Dyrran Historian

abilities.name: Regenerate
abilities.description: Heal self to full health for one Growth

cardTypes.name: Tethered Recruit
cardTypes.description: When Tethered Recruit is destroyed, increase Order by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "Its mind is muddled, but its heart is still with the army."\n- Arhart, Mire Master

cardTypes.name: Darkstrike
cardTypes.description: Deal 2 damage to target unit. If that unit is destroyed, increase Decay by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: When darkness envelops, life abandons.

cardTypes.name: Efficiency
cardTypes.description: Target unit gains +1 Attack until end of turn. If that unit kills another unit this turn, increase Energy by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The best discipline conserves energy.

cardTypes.name: Erode
cardTypes.description: Target structure is dealt 2 damage. Increase Decay by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: From life, destruction. From ashes, life.

cardTypes.name: Return To Nature
cardTypes.description: Creatures on target tile and all adjacent tiles get -1 Health until end of turn. If a creature with this effect is killed, increase Growth by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Wither and begin anew.

passiveRules.description: When Return To Nature is played, subsequent castings of Return To Nature have their cost increased by 1.

cardTypes.name: Blast Strike
cardTypes.description: Every time enchanted creature deals damage to a unit Blast Strike deals 1 damage to every unit adjacent to that unit.
cardTypes.flavor: "Needs more brutal."\n- Arran, Machine Priest

cardTypes.name: Rigged
cardTypes.description: When enchanted structure is destroyed in melee combat, its attacker takes 4 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: Strap it on, then stand back.

passiveRules.description: When enchanted unit is destroyed, it deals 1 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.

cardTypes.name: Overdrive
cardTypes.description: When Overdrive comes into play, and at the beginning of its following turns, enchanted structure's Countdown is decreased by 2. At the end of these turns, it is dealt 2 damage.
cardTypes.flavor:
"I know it'll break. I just
don't care."
- Arran, Machine Priest

cardTypes.name: Plating
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit disregards next attack or damage taken. Plating is removed afterwards.
cardTypes.flavor: Almost works like real armor.

passiveRules.description: When Plating is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Plating.

cardTypes.name: Iron Whip
cardTypes.description: Target unit takes 1 damage. Its Attack is increased by 1 until end of turn and Countdown decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: A whip for steel hides.

cardTypes.name: Incendiaries
cardTypes.description: Opponent's Structures take 3 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: It's raining cats and bombs.

cardTypes.name: Redesign
cardTypes.description: Target creature's Attack and Health switch values.
cardTypes.flavor: "Trust me, it's better this way."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

cardTypes.name: Desperation
cardTypes.description: Target creature gets +2 Attack until end of turn for each opponent unit on the same row. It is then dealt 1 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: Many a conqueror have been surprised by the ferocity of desperate defenders.

cardTypes.name: Blind Rage
cardTypes.description: Target creature deals damage equal to its Countdown to all adjacent units. Its Countdown is then increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: When you're seeing red, friends and foes look the same.

cardTypes.name: Machination Mindset
cardTypes.description: Enchanted melee creature becomes relentless. Its Attack is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: No doubt, no fear, no thought.

cardTypes.name: Concentrate Fire
cardTypes.description: Target unit with Ranged or Lobber will make an extra attack after its next attack.
cardTypes.flavor: Double the fire, double the fun.

cardTypes.name: Tool Initiate
cardTypes.description: When Tool Initiate's Countdown is 0, you may increase its Countdown by 1 to increase target structure's Attack by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "Let me just tweak this..."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

cardTypes.name: Metal Heart
cardTypes.description: Target creature gains Attack equal to the number of structures on that side until end of turn.
cardTypes.flavor: More machines, more mayhem.

cardTypes.name: Bombard
cardTypes.description: All units with Ranged or Lobber attack have their Countdown decreased by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: FIRE AT WILL!

cardTypes.name: Clock Library
cardTypes.description: When Clock Library's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed and you draw 3 scrolls.
cardTypes.flavor: Tick. Tick. Tick. Tick...

cardTypes.name: Wildling
cardTypes.description: When a creature is summoned adjacent to Wildling, Wildling is dealt 1 damage and its Attack is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Sometimes you just want to be left alone.

cardTypes.name: Mangonel
cardTypes.description: When Mangonel comes into play, your Mangonels' Countdowns are set to the lowest of any you control.
cardTypes.flavor: Powerful, portable, and packing a punch.

passiveRules.description: This unit attacks at a specific section of the board.

cardTypes.name: Vaettr of the Wild
cardTypes.description: When Vaettr of the Wild comes into play, increase Growth by 1. When Vaettr of the Wild leaves play, decrease Growth by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The forest personified. Cute.

cardTypes.name: Imperial Resources
cardTypes.description: Draw 2 scrolls. Your idols are healed by 1. All your units are healed by 1. Increase Order by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: From the furthest reaches of the Empire, they hauled their gear. Now, the time has come to use it.

cardTypes.name: Divine Mark
cardTypes.description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, it is returned to owners hand. If it was killed by damage from another unit, that unit is returned to its owner's hand.
cardTypes.flavor: "Let's try that again."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

cardTypes.name: Unbind
cardTypes.description: Sacrifice target non-Decay structure you control. Increase Decay by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "Let's put that to better use."

cardTypes.name: Charge Coil
cardTypes.description: When Charge Coil attacks, a random opponent unit is dealt 1 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: "This is extremely annoying."\n- Arhart, Mire Master

cardTypes.name: Viscera Sage
cardTypes.description: When Viscera Sage destroys another unit, draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Reading entrails takes a strong stomach.

cardTypes.name: Loyal Darkling
cardTypes.description: When Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice Loyal Darkling.
cardTypes.flavor: To night, she'll return.

passiveRules.description: When Loyal Darkling is destroyed, it deals 2 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.

cardTypes.name: Husk
cardTypes.flavor: Hollow, haggard, happy to help.

cardTypes.name: Mire Shambler
cardTypes.description: Before attacking, Mire Shambler moves to a random adjacent tile.
cardTypes.flavor: "From the depths of the mire, the Masked appeared." \n- Excerpt, Ilmire Journal II

cardTypes.name: Mangy Rat
cardTypes.description: When Mangy Rat deals damage to a creature, that creature gets poisoned for 3 rounds.
cardTypes.flavor:
Tiny Merchants
Trader of Graves
Death's Servants
Fate's Knaves

cardTypes.name: Ilmire Witch Doctor
cardTypes.description: When a Human creature adjacent to Ilmire Witch Doctor is destroyed, a Husk is summoned in its place.
cardTypes.flavor: "I can't promise you eternal life, but I can keep you standing."

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Blightbearer
cardTypes.description: Blightbearer takes 1 poison damage before attacking. When Blightbearer is destroyed, all creatures on the same row get poisoned for 3 rounds.
cardTypes.flavor: In this army, illness is no excuse.

cardTypes.name: Puppet Soldier
cardTypes.description: When Puppet Soldier is destroyed in combat, all units on the same row are destroyed.
cardTypes.flavor: The soldier is false. The fear is not.

cardTypes.name: Pillar of Disease
cardTypes.description: Opponent's units on the same row as Pillar of Disease have Attack decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The Ilmire provides for its own.

cardTypes.name: Animovore
cardTypes.description: Enchant a unit you control. When a unit adjacent to enchanted unit is destroyed, enchanted unit is dealt 1 damage and you draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: I'll take a piece of your mind, if you don't mind.

cardTypes.name: Harvester
cardTypes.description: Does not count down. When a creature is destroyed, Harvester's Countdown is decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: We've learnt to live, and die, with the Harvesters.

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

cardTypes.name: Totem of Suffering
cardTypes.description: When a creature you control is destroyed, the opposing idol on that row is dealt 1 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: Empathy can be a cruel thing.

cardTypes.name: Soul Scrounger
cardTypes.description: When a creature is destroyed, enchanted unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Those who have fallen act through the living.

cardTypes.name: Grisly Graft
cardTypes.description: Enchant creature you control. When Grisly Graft comes into play, sacrifice adjacent creatures. Enchanted creature gains Attack and Health equal to the number of creatures sacrificed.
cardTypes.flavor: Great needlework!

cardTypes.name: Arthritis
cardTypes.description: Each time enchanted unit deals damage, Arthritis also deals 1 damage to that unit.
cardTypes.flavor: You're only as old as you feel.

cardTypes.name: Restless Bones
cardTypes.description: All your Undead units gain +2 Attack until end of turn, and Countdown decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "Angering the dead is no trivial task." \n- Grahm, Animator

cardTypes.name: Tempo Theft
cardTypes.description: Two target units switch Countdown values.
cardTypes.flavor: No refund upon completed transaction.

cardTypes.name: Shroud of Unlife
cardTypes.description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, a Husk is summoned in its place.
cardTypes.flavor: "You'll not find warmth in this garb." \n- Tobai, Bone Merchant

cardTypes.name: Damning Curse
cardTypes.description: Destroy target creature. Units you control are dealt 1 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: When someone else is paying, who cares about the price?

passiveRules.description: When Damning Curse is played, subsequent castings of Damning Curse have their cost increased by 1.

cardTypes.name: Languid
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit's Attack is decreased by 2. When Languid comes into play, draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Play nice!

cardTypes.name: Energy Siphon
cardTypes.description: When Energy Siphon comes into play, increase current Energy by 3. Enchanted creature's Attack and Health are decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Resources are everywhere. It's just a matter of extraction.

cardTypes.name: Brain Lice
cardTypes.description: When Brain Lice comes into play, enchanted creature becomes poisoned for 3 rounds. When enchanted creature is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Scratch all you want. The itch is in your head.

cardTypes.name: Searing Shackles
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit deals 1 damage to its controller's idol on the same row at the end of it's controller's turn. Enchanted unit is dealt 2 damage when it moves.
cardTypes.flavor: Death is the only escape.

cardTypes.name: Miasma Well
cardTypes.description: All Poison damage is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: DO NOT DRINK.

cardTypes.name: Pillar of Fatigue
cardTypes.description: When a creature moves, its Countdown is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: What good are tactics when your men can't lift their swords?

cardTypes.name: Infectious Blight
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature is dealt 1 poison damage at the beginning of each round. If enchanted unit is killed by poison damage, a random creature on the same side gets Infectious Blight.
cardTypes.flavor: The plague doesn't discriminate.

cardTypes.name: Necrogeddon
cardTypes.description: Destroy all creatures you control. Creatures destroyed this way are replaced by undead Husks at Countdown 0.
cardTypes.flavor: "This won't do. Lets start over."\n-Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

cardTypes.name: Beast Rat
cardTypes.flavor: "Oh look how big they are compared to those in the city!"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

cardTypes.name: Soul Steal
cardTypes.description: Destroy target creature with health 2 or less. Summon a Mire Shambler on a random tile on your side.
cardTypes.flavor: Ilmire mercy is worse than death.

cardTypes.name: Regeniture
cardTypes.description: Target unit gains 2 Health. When Regeniture comes into play, enchanted unit's controller's idol on that row is dealt 1 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: Sometimes you can squeeze blood from a stone.

cardTypes.name: Draining Mist
cardTypes.description: All opponent units with Countdown 1 or less have their Countdown increased by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: "Wait, I have an idea!"\n-Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

cardTypes.name: Roasted Bean Potion
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature's Move is increased by 1. When Roasted Bean Potion comes into play, enchanted creature's Countdown is decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: It's an acquired taste. By the barrel from far Dyrra.

cardTypes.name: Oblivion Seeker
cardTypes.description: When Oblivion Seeker is destroyed, draw 2 scrolls.
cardTypes.flavor: He leaves nothing but memories.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Ilmire Rot Eater
cardTypes.description: When a creature adjacent to Ilmire Rot Eater is destroyed, Ilmire Rot Eater gains 1 Attack and 1 Health.
cardTypes.flavor: Corpses are surprisingly nutritious.

cardTypes.name: Ilmire Hunter
cardTypes.flavor: Like the mire, Hunters kill without mercy.

passiveRules.description: When Ilmire Hunter deals combat damage to a creature, that creature is destroyed.

cardTypes.name: Scavenger Construct
cardTypes.description: When an adjacent unit is destroyed, Scavenger Construct's Health is increased by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: "Feed the Construct!"\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

cardTypes.name: Atrophy
cardTypes.description: Target unit's Attack is decreased by 5 until end of opponent's next turn.
cardTypes.flavor: It usually takes longer.

cardTypes.name: Cluster Hex
cardTypes.description: All units on target tile and adjacent tiles gain Curse 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Curse upon you, and your children, and their children for seven generations.

cardTypes.name: Cursemonger
cardTypes.description: When Cursemonger's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to give target unit Curse 2.
cardTypes.flavor: "Needles and bones, my darling, that's my trade."

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Pestis
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature gains +1 Attack for each Rat on that side. When enchanted creature kills another unit, summon a Mangy Rat on a random tile the same side.
cardTypes.flavor: There's no virtue among vermin.

cardTypes.name: Hex Marks
cardTypes.description: When enchanted creature deals combat damage to an idol, it deals 3 extra damage.
cardTypes.flavor: It's not just about looks.

cardTypes.name: Noaidi
cardTypes.description: When Noaidi comes into play, you gain 1 resource of each non-Growth type your opponent has.
cardTypes.flavor: For the Kinfolk, the moose migration marks the beginning of the new year.

cardTypes.name: Solemn Giant
cardTypes.description: Does not count down. Pay 2 Energy to decrease Countdown by 2. This ability can be used multiple times per turn.
cardTypes.flavor: "The Giants are no more, so we made new ones."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

abilities.name: Pay 2 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 2 Energy to decrease Countdown by 2.

cardTypes.name: Dust Runner
cardTypes.description: When Dust Runner deals damage to a creature with 3 or less Health, that creature is destroyed.
cardTypes.flavor: "Kinfolk make for great\ntarget practice."\n- Sarh, Dust Runner

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Wings Shield
cardTypes.description: Wings Shield has Armor X, where X is the number of units behind it (combat damage dealt to Wings Shield is decreased by X).
cardTypes.flavor: "I shield those I love. From them I draw strength."

cardTypes.name: Automata Forge
cardTypes.description: Instead of attacking, Automata Forge summons a Gun Automaton on an adjacent tile. Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1. This ability can be used multiple times per turn.

abilities.name: Pay 3 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1.

cardTypes.name: Stag Heart
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Attack and +1 Health for each Stag Heart on the same side.
cardTypes.flavor: The Kinfolk judge every beast on their own merits.

cardTypes.name: Faith Duty
cardTypes.description: Enchant unit you control. At the end of each of its turns, enchanted unit is dealt 1 damage and opponent units on that row get their Countdown increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Willingly, but not wisely.

cardTypes.name: Metal Wonder
cardTypes.description: When your opponent plays a Spell or Enchantment, Metal Wonder deals 2 damage to a random idol under their control.
cardTypes.flavor: Machine victory, no fiddly bits.

cardTypes.name: Crone
cardTypes.description: Crone does not attack. When Crone is destroyed in melee combat, the attacking unit is destroyed.
cardTypes.flavor: "Grandma in the front. The hag's time is up."\n- Halm, Berserker

cardTypes.name: Breaker
cardTypes.description: When Breaker deals damage, its Attack is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Where Breakers go,\nonly twigs remain.

cardTypes.name: Oak Blood
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature gains +6 Health.
cardTypes.flavor: Trading with Vilewood trees is never a bargain.

passiveRules.description: All non-combat damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Fierce Tactics
cardTypes.description: All your melee creatures become Relentless until end of turn.
cardTypes.flavor: "They have the weapons, but we have the will!"\n- Halm, Berserker

cardTypes.name: Rat King
cardTypes.description: Summons a Beast Rat on target tile and on two adjacent random tiles.
cardTypes.flavor: Obey the Jarl, but fear the King.

cardTypes.name: Appurtenance
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Health for each Beast you control.
cardTypes.flavor: They have their leaders, nature has hers.

passiveRules.description: When Appurtenance is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Appurtenance.

cardTypes.name: Berserker
cardTypes.description: When Berserker takes damage, Berserker's Attack is increased by 1. At the beginning of your turn, Berserker heals 1 point of Health.
cardTypes.flavor: "No. We only fight for Kav."\n- Halm, Berserker.

cardTypes.name: Sister of the Bear
cardTypes.flavor: "Honored Sisters. Your strength will be my hammer against the hated Empire!"\n- Jarl Urhald

cardTypes.name: Kinfolk Ranger
cardTypes.flavor: Many of the ghost stories told about the deeper woods can probably be attributed to the stealthy rangers.

cardTypes.name: Owl
cardTypes.description: When Owl moves, its Countdown is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Hoot. Hoot?

passiveRules.description: This unit can move to any tile on your side.

cardTypes.name: Sister of the Owl
cardTypes.description: An Owl is summoned together with Sister of the Owl. When an Owl deals damage, Sister of the Owl's Attack increases by 1. When an Owl is destroyed, Sister of the Owl's Health increases by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Knowing and nocturnal.

cardTypes.name: Storm Runner
cardTypes.flavor: Storm Runners have perfected the art of... throwing.

passiveRules.description: This unit attacks at a specific section of the board.

cardTypes.name: State Machine
cardTypes.description: When a creature comes into play on opponent's side, State Machine deals 1 damage to that creature. When State Machine's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed.
cardTypes.flavor: Originally intended to roast beans.

cardTypes.name: Supercharged
cardTypes.description: At the beginning of each of enchanted unit's turns, enchanted unit makes a ranged attack dealing 1 combat damage.
cardTypes.flavor: It's not like they know how it works, exactly... but it's certainly useful.

cardTypes.name: Machine Chant
cardTypes.description: Deal damage to target unit equal to the number of structures you control. Increase Energy by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "It's an odd song for sure. Just wait for the crescendo!" \n- Arran, Machine Priest

cardTypes.name: Scout Automaton
cardTypes.description: All other Automatons you control get +1 Attack.
cardTypes.flavor: No machine is complete without its smallest gears.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.
All combat damage dealt to Scout Automaton is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Magnetizer
cardTypes.description: Any unit hit by Magnetizer gets its Countdown increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Power is relative. A sleeping enemy is a harmless enemy.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Mystic Altar
cardTypes.description: When Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown and increase Countdown of target creature you control by 2 to draw a scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Learning takes time.

abilities.name: Mystic Altar
abilities.description: Target unit you control has its countdown increased by 2. Draw a scroll.

cardTypes.name: Redeploy
cardTypes.description: Swap two target rows on your side.
cardTypes.flavor: "Wings to the east, vanguard south. Go!"

cardTypes.name: Caller's Bane
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit deals combat damage to an idol, other idols on the same side are dealt 1 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: Each idol is strongly linked to its Caller.

cardTypes.name: Aging Knight
cardTypes.description: Each time Aging Knight attacks, its base Countdown is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The last thing a warrior learns is patience.

cardTypes.name: Royal Banner
cardTypes.description: All non-human units get Countdown increased by 2 after attacking.
cardTypes.flavor: Where the banner goes, the Empire soon follows.

cardTypes.name: Fleetness
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit's base Countdown is reduced by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Faster is better than Stronger.

cardTypes.name: Machinated
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature gets Attack increased by 5 and base Countdown increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Man shall become metal.

cardTypes.name: Corrode
cardTypes.description: Units you control deal double damage to idols until end of turn. If at least one idol is destroyed by a unit you control this turn,  draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Even the Machines know heresy.

cardTypes.name: Wings Soldier
cardTypes.flavor: The elites of the Empire strike with precision.

cardTypes.name: Vigor Extraction
cardTypes.description: Target unit's Countdown is increased by 2. If Countdown is then 4 or more, increase Decay by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The life of another, put to better use.

cardTypes.name: Wicked Being
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit is attacked in melee, attacker gets Curse 3.
cardTypes.flavor: There are no innocents in the Mire.

passiveRules.description: When enchanted unit is destroyed, it deals 1 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.

cardTypes.name: Refined Strategy
cardTypes.description: Move target structure you control to an unoccupied tile on that side. Its countdown is decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "Perhaps we should move the catapults to the ridge?"

cardTypes.name: Siege Cracker
cardTypes.description: When Siege Cracker deals damage to an idol, that idol is dealt an additional 5 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: What do you mean, "bombs for hands"?

cardTypes.name: Ripper
cardTypes.flavor: "I was taught to be ready!"

cardTypes.name: Unforseen Onslaught
cardTypes.description: All your creatures with attack 1 or less get Slayer until end of turn.
cardTypes.flavor: 'Tis just a scratch.

cardTypes.name: Ilmire Tribesman
cardTypes.flavor: Fighting for their kin, alive or dead.

cardTypes.name: Pest Dissimulator
cardTypes.description: When Pest Dissimulator deals damage to a creature, the damaged creature and adjacent creatures are poisoned for 3 rounds.
cardTypes.flavor: Don't try and find me.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Monstrous Brood
cardTypes.description: Creatures you control with the same name as target creature are destroyed and replaced by a Monstrosity.
cardTypes.flavor: A second birth. A new life. More teeth.

cardTypes.name: Monstrosity
cardTypes.description: As long as another Monstrosity is adjacent, Attack and Health are increased by 1. As long as any other creature is adjacent, Attack and Health are decreased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Twisted. Transformed. Terrifying.

cardTypes.name: Fungify
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature gets Health increased by 5 and base Countdown increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "Nightmarish stuff,\nbut damn, it works." \n- Isurd, Scryer

cardTypes.name: Ire And Bile
cardTypes.description: All units gain Curse 1 and +1 Attack until end of opponent's turn.
cardTypes.flavor: A conflict is easier to start than it is to end.

cardTypes.name: Sickening Fumes
cardTypes.description: Until end of opponent's turn, opponent units have their attack decreased by 3.
cardTypes.flavor: It's not weather. It's miasma density.

cardTypes.name: Uneasy Alliance
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature's Attack is increased by 2 for each creature with Uneasy Alliance on the same side. When enchanted unit is destroyed, all units on that side enchanted with Uneasy Alliance are destroyed.
cardTypes.flavor: This won't end well.

cardTypes.name: Bloodline Taint
cardTypes.description: Target unit, and other units on the same side that share a subtype, gain Curse 2.
cardTypes.flavor: A cruel legacy.

cardTypes.name: Watcher
cardTypes.description: When a unit adjacent to Watcher is destroyed by non-combat damage or death effects, Watcher deals 2 damage to a random opponent idol.
cardTypes.flavor: The Harvester's wrath lingers even after death.

cardTypes.name: Wings Captain
cardTypes.description: When Wings Captain's Countdown becomes 0, Wings Captain and adjacent Soldiers have their Move increased by 1 until end of turn.
cardTypes.flavor: "Flanking maneuver!"\n- Ays, Wings Captain

cardTypes.name: Eager Scryer
cardTypes.description: If Eager Scryer's Countdown is 2 or more at the end of your turn, draw a scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: "I deal in confusion. I buy it from you, and sell it to your enemy."\n- Isurd, Scryer

cardTypes.name: Cannonetta
cardTypes.flavor: "T- the bullet went through clean. I'll be fine."\n- Aru, now deceased

passiveRules.description: When Cannonetta deals damage, half of that damage (rounded down) is dealt to the next target on that row.
This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Untainted
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit has Ward.\n\n(Ward: Cannot be targeted by opponent Spells or Enchantments)
cardTypes.flavor: Those who do not want can not be corrupted.

cardTypes.name: Machine Divinator
cardTypes.description: Machine Divinator does not attack. As long as Machine Divinator is in play, your structures' Health is increased by 1. When Machine Divinator's Countdown becomes 0, a random structure you control with Countdown 1 or more has its Countdown decreased by 1.

cardTypes.name: Beetle Stone
cardTypes.description: When another Beetle Stone comes into play, two damage is dealt to a random opponent idol. Beetle Stone is then placed at the top of your library.
cardTypes.flavor: The beetles were extremely popular once.

cardTypes.name: Eclipse
cardTypes.description: All your current resources are converted into Decay.
cardTypes.flavor: "And then, all over the realm, it was dark..."

cardTypes.name: Ancestral Pact
cardTypes.description: During your opponent's next turn, when a unit you control is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: We fear no death.

cardTypes.name: Piercing Projectile
cardTypes.description: Enchanted ranged creature gains Piercing. Its Attack is increased by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "With these, you'll get through the strongest armor."\n- Arran, Machine Priest

cardTypes.name: Stifled Advance
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit's base Countdown is increased by 2. When Stifled Advance enters play, enchanted unit's Countdown increases by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "They can't attack us if they're busy dodging arrows."

cardTypes.name: Blightseed
cardTypes.description: Target creature you control has its Countdown increased by 2. If it is still on the board at the beginning of your next turn, draw 2 scrolls and increase current Decay by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: "Take two of these and come see me tomorrow."\n- Yon, Witch Doctor

cardTypes.name: Morbid Curiosity
cardTypes.description: When enchanted creature kills another creature, you draw a scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: "Show me your organs, and I will tell you who you were."

cardTypes.name: Stitcher
cardTypes.description: When Stitcher's Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice target creature to increase another target creature's Attack and Health by 2. If you do, Stitcher's Countdown is reset.

abilities.name: Stitch
abilities.description: Sacrifice target creature to increase another target creature's Attack and Health by 2.

cardTypes.name: Arhart's Disciple
cardTypes.description: When Arhart's Disciple damages a unit in combat, opponent's idol on the same row takes 1 damage.
cardTypes.flavor: "Fresh canvas! She'll be pleased."

cardTypes.name: Blade Husk
cardTypes.flavor: Created to kill without remorse.

passiveRules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

cardTypes.name: Bog Hound
cardTypes.flavor: Playing fetch is far more interesting when there are multiple limbs to choose from.

passiveRules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

cardTypes.name: Festering Freak
cardTypes.description: When Festering Freak deals damage to a creature, that creature gets poisoned for 3 rounds. When Festering Freak is attacked in melee, attacking unit becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.
cardTypes.flavor: Sometimes, the Masked get it wrong.

cardTypes.name: Corpus Collector
cardTypes.description: When Corpus Collector kills another creature, summon a Husk creature on a random tile adjacent to Corpus Collector.
cardTypes.flavor: "Alas, this one's no good. Not enough arms."\n- Orren, Corpus Collector

cardTypes.name: Baleful Witch
cardTypes.description: When Baleful Witch comes into play, any Curses on creatures in play are triggered (dealing damage).
cardTypes.flavor: Her power is drawn from the purest spite.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Soldier's Bond
cardTypes.description: When enchanted unit takes damage, all units behind it count down by one.
cardTypes.flavor: One for all. All for naught.

passiveRules.description: When Soldier's Bond is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Soldier's Bond.

cardTypes.name: Pilgrim's Feet
cardTypes.description: When enchanted creature moves, it is healed by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: "I don't need shoes. I have faith."

passiveRules.description: All non-combat damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Reversal
cardTypes.description: Frontmost and rearmost units on one side of target row switch places. Draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: "The right tool for the right job. And you tools are in the wrong place!"

cardTypes.name: Cursed Presence
cardTypes.description: Enchant opponent unit. When that unit takes damage, other opponent units on that row get Curse 2. If a structure is enchanted, those units get Curse 4 instead.
cardTypes.flavor: "The nearby plants withered, and the birds fell silent. No one dared approach."

cardTypes.name: Fulmination Conduit
cardTypes.description: Does not count down. Fulmination Conduit counts up instead of down at the beginning of each turn. You may sacrifice Fulmination Conduit to add its Countdown to your current Energy.

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.description: Add current Countdown to your current Energy.

cardTypes.name: Nuru, Flesh-seamstress
cardTypes.description: Nuru does not attack. When Nuru's Countdown becomes 0, Nuru summons 2 Husks with Countdown 0 at random positions on your side. The Husks are destroyed after attacking.

passiveRules.description: Spawning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

passiveRules.displayName: Dominion: Undead creatures you control get +2 Attack.
passiveRules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

cardTypes.name: Malevolent Gaze
cardTypes.description: Target Creature's Move is reduced by 1 until end of opponent's turn. It gets Curse 1. Dominion: That creature gets an additional Curse 9.
cardTypes.flavor: Malice, pure and unguarded.

cardTypes.name: Gallant Defender
cardTypes.description: As long as you have fewer units on the field than your opponent, Gallant Defender gets Armor 2.
cardTypes.flavor: "Hold the walls! Protect your own!"\n- Cay, Royal Envoy

cardTypes.name: Hired Smuggler
cardTypes.flavor: "Got your parts, ahyup."

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals combat damage to an idol.

cardTypes.name: Power Trip
cardTypes.description: Increase your current Energy by 6.
cardTypes.flavor: "We need more."\n"But-"\n"MORE!"

cardTypes.name: Ash Runner
cardTypes.flavor: Looks are important to runners. To some, more than others.

passiveRules.description: When Ash Runner deals damage, half of that damage (rounded down) is dealt to the next target on that row.
This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Echomaton
cardTypes.description: When an opponent plays a spell, increase Attack by 2. When Echomaton is destroyed, if Attack is 4 or more, increase Energy by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: The perfect pet for a priest.

cardTypes.name: Boom Reaver
cardTypes.flavor: "Why's he carrying a ship's cannon?"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

passiveRules.displayName: Pillage: Immune to damage until beginning of your next turn
passiveRules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals combat damage to an idol.

cardTypes.name: Replicaton
cardTypes.description: When Replicaton is destroyed, return to owners hand if your current Energy is 2 or more.
cardTypes.flavor: You only need one. Of course, use more if you've got them.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Sudden Eruption
cardTypes.description: When Sudden Eruption is played, X random opponent units are dealt 2 damage, where X is the surge value.
cardTypes.flavor: "Too frequent by far, and utterly horrifying."\n - Siani, Dyrran Historian

passiveRules.description: When this spell is cast, all remaining resources of its type are spent. The surge value is equal to the amount spent.

cardTypes.name: Outcast Rebel
cardTypes.flavor: Ill-tempered and bad-mannered. No wonder the braves love him.

cardTypes.name: Culling the Flock
cardTypes.description: Sacrifice target Beast. All other Beasts you control have their Attack increased by that unit's Attack until end of turn, and become fully healed.
cardTypes.flavor: The laws of beasts are harsh.

cardTypes.name: Earthen Testament
cardTypes.description: All your enchanted units count down by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: Few can best the Kinfolk on their own soil.

cardTypes.name: Vengeful Vaettr
cardTypes.flavor: Not so cute anymore.

passiveRules.displayName: Pillage: Increase Growth by 1. Vengeful Vaettr is dealt 1 damage.
passiveRules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals combat damage to an idol.

cardTypes.name: Bountiful Times
cardTypes.description: Summons a Bunny on target tile. All Bunnies count down by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "But... there were only a handful yesterday!"

cardTypes.name: Verdant Veil
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature's Health is increased by 3. As long as its Health is no less than its base value, it has Ward.
cardTypes.flavor: "I swear! I saw a person in there!"

cardTypes.name: Underdog's Spite
cardTypes.description: All units you control with Attack 2 or less count down by 1.
cardTypes.flavor: As they dragged him out of the forest, the dagger was still lodged in his shoulder.

cardTypes.name: Wetland Ranger
cardTypes.flavor: With Ilmire warring against the Empire, the rangers were put to use where needed.

passiveRules.displayName: Pillage: All your units get +1 Attack during your and your opponent's next turns.
passiveRules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals combat damage to an idol.

cardTypes.name: Jarl Urhald
cardTypes.flavor: All Jarls inspire loyalty and courage. Urhald lives it,\nbreathes it.

passiveRules.description: Spawning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.
If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.
When Urhald comes into play, adjacent units have their Attack increased by 2 until end of turn.

passiveRules.displayName: Pillage: Urhald's Countdown is set to 0 after attacking.
passiveRules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals combat damage to an idol.

cardTypes.name: Wings Warder
cardTypes.description: Wings Warder does not attack. As long as Wings Warder's Countdown is 1 or less, other units you control on the same row as Wings Warder\nhave Ward.
cardTypes.flavor: Not all armor is physical.

cardTypes.name: Tempest Reaver
cardTypes.description: Tempest Reaver's Attack is equal to your current Energy resource.
cardTypes.flavor: Managing power, one shot at a time.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.
All combat damage dealt to Tempest Reaver is reduced by 1.

cardTypes.name: Hired Marksman
cardTypes.description: When Hired Marksman's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to deal 3 damage to target creature.
cardTypes.flavor: "I aim for your heart."

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

cardTypes.name: Vicious Strike
cardTypes.description: When Vicious Strike is played, target unit gets +X Attack until end of turn, where X is the surge value.
cardTypes.flavor: The Reavers know a good fight when they see one.

passiveRules.description: When this spell is cast, all remaining resources of its type are spent. The surge value is equal to the amount spent.

cardTypes.name: Earthborn Mystic
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creatures you control have +1 Attack. When Earthborn Mystic's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to draw an enchantment scroll. If you do, Earthborn Mystic takes 1 damage.

abilities.name: Draw Enchantment
abilities.description: Draw an Enchantment scroll. Take 1 damage.

cardTypes.name: Earthbond
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit you control cannot be moved by opponent. Enchanted unit's Health is increased by 2.
cardTypes.flavor: The Earthborn don't budge.

cardTypes.name: Seed of Insurgency
cardTypes.description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, it's summoned again on the same tile. Its countdown is set to 1.
cardTypes.flavor: Some wars, you just don't quit.

cardTypes.name: Wings Spear
cardTypes.flavor: The Spears are taught the true power of patience.

passiveRules.displayName: Spiky 2. Dominion: Spiky is increased by 2.
passiveRules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

cardTypes.name: Wings Cleaver
cardTypes.flavor: "We don't start fights. We finish them."\n- Shim, Wings Cleaver

passiveRules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

passiveRules.displayName: Dominion: +3 Attack. Base Countdown is decreased by 1.
passiveRules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

cardTypes.name: Striped Fangbear
cardTypes.description: As long as opponent controls any Humans, Striped Fangbear is Relentless and its Attack is increased by 3.
cardTypes.flavor: The Sisters don't really train fangbears. They simply encourage their natural hate of knights and soldiers.

cardTypes.name: Righteous Partisan
cardTypes.description: As long as you have less units on the field than your opponent, Righteous Partisan gets +4 Attack.
cardTypes.flavor: "My home, my war."

cardTypes.name: Nuru's Needle
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit's Attack, Health and Move are decreased by 1. It gains Curse 1.
cardTypes.flavor: "Life is my craft. The dead and dying, my canvas."\n- Nuru

cardTypes.name: Unground
cardTypes.description: Any time an idol takes damage, enchanted unit takes damage equal to half that amount (rounded down).
cardTypes.flavor: "Whether we know it or not, we all draw upon the earth."

cardTypes.name: Wings Charger
cardTypes.flavor: Subtlety was never her strong suit.

cardTypes.name: Infiltrate
cardTypes.description: Target unit's Countdown is increased by 2. Draw a scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: "Create a diversion. I'll snag the map."

cardTypes.name: Ruse
cardTypes.description: Opponent's units get their Countdown decreased by 2. Your units gain Spiky 2 and Armor 1 until your next turn.
cardTypes.flavor: "The Kin is a weed in our Imperial garden. It musn't grow."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist.

cardTypes.name: Cay, Royal Envoy
cardTypes.description: At the end of your turn, if an opponent unit was destroyed in combat, draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: \n"The sharpest mind I know. Wasted on war without surcease."\n- Aos, Royal Scribe

passiveRules.description: Spawning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.
Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down. When active, this unit cannot be targeted by opponent Spells or Enchantments.

cardTypes.name: Warding Stone
cardTypes.description: When Warding Stone is destroyed in combat, attacking unit is returned to owner's hand and you draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: "You bring your toys, mystic. I'll bring mine."\n - Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

cardTypes.name: Prisoners of War
cardTypes.description: Take the next Growth, Decay and Energy creature scrolls from your library and add them to your hand.
cardTypes.flavor: "We don't need reserves.\nWe have prisoners."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist.

cardTypes.name: Electrify
cardTypes.description: Each structure you control makes a ranged attack dealing 1 combat damage.
cardTypes.flavor: "Let's see what happens if we connect these two."\n -Arran, Machine Priest

cardTypes.name: Top Reaver Thea
cardTypes.flavor: "Never fear, Thea's here."

passiveRules.description: Spawning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.
This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.
When Thea deals damage, half of that damage (rounded down) is dealt to the next target on that row.

passiveRules.displayName: Pillage: Your current Energy is increased by 2 at the beginning of your next turn.
passiveRules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals combat damage to an idol.

cardTypes.name: Reaping Mask
cardTypes.description: Enchanted unit's Attack and Health are increased by 3. When enchanted unit destroys a creature, draw a creature scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: Its promise cannot be resisted for long. Nor can its hunger.

passiveRules.description: When enchanted unit is destroyed, it deals 3 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.

cardTypes.name: Eternal Sword
cardTypes.description: Enchanted creature gets +2 Attack and +1 Health. When enchanted creature is destroyed, a random adjacent creature gets Eternal Sword.
cardTypes.flavor: This weapon was passed down through generations. It never leaves the battlefield.

cardTypes.name: Skythorn
cardTypes.description: Does not count down. When a creature comes into play on your side, Skythorn's Countdown is decreased by 1. When Skythorn's Countdown becomes 0, draw 1 scroll.
cardTypes.flavor: \nIt thrives on life.

passiveRules.description: When Skythorn is attacked in melee, Skythorn deals 1 damage to attacking unit.

cardTypes.name: Oculus Cannon
cardTypes.description: Does not count down. When an opponent unit moves to a tile on the same row as Oculus Cannon, Oculus Cannon's Countdown is set to 0.

passiveRules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.
When Oculus Cannon deals damage, half of that damage (rounded down) is dealt to the next target on that row.

cardTypes.name: Void Gate
cardTypes.description: All combat damage dealt to Void Gate is instead dealt to the idol behind it.
